name: Balances
description: Balances for Tangle. Stores and provides information related to Tangle holders' balances.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Returns the balance of a Tangle token holder.

functionDecorators.name: mintOnce
functionDecorators.description: Mints the initial supply of Tangle to an address. Can only be used once.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The address to mint the initial supply to.
